spells.name: Absorb Toxicity
spells.description: You become immune to diseases and toxins, absorb one, and then spread it to others.

spells.name: Energy Siege Shot
spells.description: A Large siege engine deals energy damage that you designate with other effects depending on the type of energy you choose.

spells.name: Hostile Juxtaposition
spells.description: You create a dimensional link with a targeted creature, and switch spots with it.

spells.name: Stoneskin, Communal
spells.description: As stoneskin, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Summoner Conduit
spells.description: The target eidolon's summoner takes damage whenever the eidolon does.

spells.name: Symbol of Striking
spells.description: As symbol of death, but fills a 5-foot square.

spells.name: Wreath of Blades
spells.description: Four mithral daggers speed around you, attacking nearby creatures and protecting your spellcasting from attacks of opportunity.
